availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Quintus C. Shanks (Hartford, Ohio County, Ky, sheriff, Colonel )

body.p: Hartford, Ohio County, Kentucky, sheriff and soldier. Kentucky native. Married to Lucinda Shanks. Father of Philena E. Shanks, Lucie Shanks. Sheriff in Hartford, Ohio County in 1860. Colonel of the Twelfth Kentucky Cavalry (U.S.A.) from October 11, 1862 until February 14, 1863.

ab.bibl:
Find A Grave, "Colonel Quintus C. Shanks (April 1, 1811- July 12, 1900)," Memorial #13028779, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/13028779 (accessed January 04, 2019).
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 1, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 302.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ohio County, Hartford p. 197.
